Banner.Description: I'm a software engineer with over 5 years of experience, specializing in developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions. I pride myself on my ability to translate project requirements into visually appealing and efficient solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hey there, I'm Emir Baycan. I hold long variety of skills and currently exploring the world of Mobile App Design and Development. Throughout my career, I've been involved in various large-scale projects, prioritizing responsive design, performance optimization, and cross-functional collaboration. I love turning a project's 'wish list' into something that not only looks great but also performs well.

On a typical day, you'll find me working hand-in-hand with backend engineers on API integrations, turning designs into actual, clickable things, and squashing bugs with our QA team. I'm all about teamwork, taking ownership of what I do, and always looking for ways to help others grow in their roles, too.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
AboutMe.conclude: So that's a bit about me. Can't wait to bring my skills and passion to some more exciting projects!
Experience.Title: Where I've Worked
FeatureProjects.Title: Experiences
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Kalenuxer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A next-generation web application framework engineered for maximum performance and flexibility. Kalenuxer delivers a comprehensive suite: multi-language support, advanced minification and obfuscation, server-side rendering, modular templating (mails, sections, pages), classification, SVG-to-icon conversion, version control, optimized CSS/JS structure, and robust localization—empowering rapid development of scalable, production-grade applications.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: My Partners Law Firm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Custom-built website and control panel for a leading law firm, leveraging Kalenuxer’s SSR algorithms to seamlessly convert dynamic SQL data into optimized HTML structures. Delivers real-time content updates, secure client management, and a powerful admin interface tailored to legal workflows.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hukuki Yeterlilik Akademisi
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Comprehensive website and admin panel for an education services firm, built with Kalenuxer. Features secure course management, multi-level user access, and real-time updates, designed for scalability and seamless content delivery.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Morkoç Law Firm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: High-impact website and bespoke control panel for a law firm, built on Kalenuxer. Focus on speed, secure case management, and dynamic content delivery—tailored for the legal industry’s demanding standards.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Karalar Prefabric
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Fully-managed website and administration panel for a prefabricated housing firm, powered by Kalenuxer. Delivers advanced catalog management, customer interaction tools, and robust backend capabilities for business growth.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Eyüp Sultan Tulumbacısı
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Brand-forward website for a popular dessert company, developed with Kalenuxer. Optimized for user engagement and high-conversion, featuring product showcases and an intuitive, easy-to-manage backend.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Girişimci Hukukçular Derneği
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: First-of-its-kind web platform and management system for a law society, utilizing the LAMP stack. Includes member management, event automation, and secure communications modules.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hukuk Eğitim Programları
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: End-to-end website and control panel for an education collective, continuously updated with new features. Built on Kalenuxer, supporting multi-course content and custom reporting.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Do Eloboost
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Robust website and backend system for an online gaming service, built with Kalenuxer and optimized for performance, automation, and secure client management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Terapi Kliniği
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Dynamic website and control panel for a psychologist practice, engineered with Laravel and custom JavaScript libraries. Successfully adapted Laravel for standard shared hosting, optimizing both backend logic and client-side interactivity.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Murat Bulat Law Firm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Feature-rich website and management panel for a law office, developed on the LAMP stack. Provides automated case management, secure client portals, and streamlined admin tools.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio w Kalenuxer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Multi-language portfolio websites developed as a technical showcase using Kalenuxer and LAMP—demonstrating full-stack proficiency and clean, scalable architecture.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio w React
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Multi-language portfolio sites designed with React, Node.js, and MySQL on Ubuntu/Apache. Highlights advanced front-end techniques and seamless integration with backend infrastructure.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio w Laravel & React
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Full-stack portfolio websites built as technical proof-of-concept projects, combining Laravel, React, Node.js, and Three.js for modern, interactive UI/UX.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio w Nextjs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Next.js-based multi-language portfolio sites, featuring dynamic content delivery, email integration via Resend, and scalable cloud hosting solutions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Account Creator
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Automated account creator for social platforms, utilizing C#, Selenium, Geckofx, and cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure). Enables high-volume, unattended account registrations with VPN/proxy support.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Voter
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Automated human-data generator using Python, Selenium, and Tor Browser IP rotation—built for scalable, anonymized user simulation.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Height and Speed Calculator
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Python-based algorithm to precisely calculate object height from input parameters—demonstrating applied math and algorithmic thinking.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Digital Screen Detector
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Real-time detection of digital screens from live camera feeds, leveraging Python and YOLO for computer vision applications. [GitHub](https://github.com/emirbaycan/yolo_digital_screen_detector)

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Digital Screen Reader
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Automated detection and reading of digital screens in live video streams, integrating OCR and computer vision with Python. [GitHub](https://github.com/emirbaycan/ocr_digital_screen_reader)

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Digital Screen Alarm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Real-time digital screen monitoring with image capture and threshold-based alerting—triggers image saves when values exceed specified limits. [GitHub](https://github.com/emirbaycan/digital_screen_alarm_with_rtsp_camera)

OtherProjects.Title: Other Noteworthy Projects
Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
Testimonial.Title: My clients' impressions of me
